original: 正史所載甚少。家族本為益州當地豪強，其父因劉焉初入蜀立威而被劉焉處死。劉備得益州後，方被起用。演義中，諸葛良病逝五丈原前，託李福將遺言告知劉禪。
text: The official history contains very little. The family was originally a local tycoon in Yizhou, and his father was executed by Liu Yan because Liu Yanchu entered Shu Liwei. After Liu Bei got Yizhou, he was used. In the novel, before Zhugeliang died of illness at Wuzhangyuan, Li Fu informed Liu Chan of his last words.
